body:
- FFTW3 library inclusion
- `OpenMP` support
- `USE_NOFSCHECK=TRUE`  # FSCHECK, caused problems like code crashes, hence making NOFSCHECK=NO
- Added few default install arguments like `USE_BLAS=y`, `USE_FFTW3=y`
- Giving more flexibility to add `ARMCI_NETWORK`, please find: https://nwchemgit.github.io/ARMCI.html
title: nwchem: FFTW3 library inclusion
